article_title: Operation Covid-19 will allow self-reporting of cases, to get ahead of official figures
article_description: The Canadian founder of a startup who caught Covid 19 from Justin Trudeau s wife has launched an initiative to allow anyone to self report their own case of the disease and publish the results  helping authorities to get ahead of the pandemic  Operation Covid
article_content: The Canadian founder of a startup who caught Covid 19 from Justin Trudeaus wife has launched an initiative to allow anyone to self report their own case of the disease and publish the results  helping authorities to get ahead of the pandemic Operation Covid   1862 chars
